comment: Great experience overall. The hotel was clean and comfortable. The staff were friendly and helpful.
Absolutely loved my stay! The location was perfect, and the room had stunning views of the city.
The hotel was decent, but the room was smaller than expected. The amenities were satisfactory.
Disappointed with the cleanliness of the room. The bathroom had a strange odor, and the towels were worn out.
Fantastic stay! The hotel exceeded my expectations in every way. Would highly recommend.
Enjoyed my stay. The hotel staff was accommodating and the location was convenient.
Had an amazing time at the resort. The facilities were top-notch and the service was excellent.
Mixed experience. The room was clean but the noise from the neighboring rooms was disturbing.
